content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"><ShortName>SCAR</ShortName><Description>SCAR initiates, develops and coordinates scientific research in the Antarctic region and provides objective independent scientific advice to the Antarctic Treaty Consultative Meetings.</Description><InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding><Image type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon" width="16" height="16">http://www.scar.org/templates/scar/favicon.ico</Image><Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="http://www.scar.org/component/search/?Itemid=103&format=opensearch"/><Url type="text/html" template="http://www.scar.org/index.php?option=com_search&searchword={searchTerms}"/></OpenSearchDescription>
